byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Recently purchased house to be used as reception center for Brit child refugees
snippet: TUXEDO PARK, N.Y., June 30 --The former home of Charles E. Mitchell here is to be converted into a clearing house for British children sent to the United States for refuge from the war, it was disclosed today by Mrs. Hans ......

headline.main: TUXEDO PARK GROUP PLANS EVACUEE AID; Former C.E. Mitchell Home to Be Used as Clearing House for British Children BACKERS GUARANTEE COST Will Maintain the First 50, but Seek National Movement to Expand Project
